review: The Fire Stick does the job well. I would have given it 5 stars except that it's a bit slower than the Roku that I also own.
author: Rick L. Stevens

review: The fire stick is 100% the most convenient streaming device ever made and the fact u can take it anywhere is a major + I would recommend this to everyone.2 thumbs up for sure
author: Benjamin Cullum

review: Bought as an alternative to cable. Loving it so far.
author: nicole

review: This fire tv stick has met my expectations more than I could have imagined.  I am renting a home with a tv but does not have netflix, or hulu or prime and I ordered Amazon fire tv stick and now I am hooked up 24/7 to the tv I like when I want to watch it. And an added bonus I get music as well.  I highly recommend this to anyone with internet capabilities to watch whatever, whenever and where ever you wish.  And the price is excellent.
author: amazonshopper1

review: I am so pleased at what one can do with the "stick" -- movies, TV, photos, music. What a find!
author: Nancy Galster

review: Works great no more movie rentals
author: Kimberly Hart
